name: Mallow Mansion
description:
Mallow Mansion was made for the Newbies and Vets 2019 game jam at USC. Mallow Mansion was designed and developed in 48 hours by a team of 7 who's experience ranged from first time game jammer to veteran game jammer.

Uses 4 Controllers!!!

We all worked together to design this project

Billy Wang - Engineer
Juan Lobo - Artist & Level Designer
Evan Wright - Artist & Level Designer
Haotian Zhang - Artist & Level Designer
Charlie Brown - Audio Designer
Katie Zao - Artist & Level Designer
Skylar Kelley - Vet Designer & Engineer

We hope you enjoy this cute little game we made! :)
